Docs.summary: Represents a stream for writing to a blob.

public abstract Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.ICancellableAsyncResult BeginCommit (AsyncCallback callback, object state);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.ICancellableAsyncResult BeginCommit(class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed

Docs.param: An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the commit is complete.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous commit request from other requests.
Docs.returns: An ICancellableAsyncResult that represents the asynchronous commit, which could still be pending.

Docs.param: An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the flush is complete.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Commit() cil managed

Docs.summary: Clears all buffers for this stream, causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying blob, and commits the blob.

Docs.param: An object containing a reference to the pending asynchronous request to finish.
Docs.summary: Waits for the pending asynchronous commit to complete.
